definitions.definition: to attract (the attention of someone or something); to entice; to draw; to fascinate; to appeal to

parsedExamples.example: 吸引外商投資 / 吸引外商投资  ―  xīyǐn wàishāng tóuzī  ―  to attract foreign investment
吸引眼球  ―  xīyǐn yǎnqiú  ―  to catch people's eyes
吸引注意  ―  xīyǐn zhùyì  ―  to attract attention
吸引流量  ―  xīyǐn liúliàng  ―  to attract traffic
